ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.documentation: Lists the tags you have assigned to the resource.

ListWorkspaces.name: ListWorkspaces
ListWorkspaces.documentation: Lists all AMP workspaces, including workspaces being created or deleted.

ServiceQuotaExceededException.documentation: Request would cause a service quota to be exceeded.

key.documentation:
The key of the tag.

Constraints: Tag keys are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 128 Unicode characters. Valid characters are Unicode letters, digits, white space, and any of the following symbols: _ . : / = + - @ May not begin with aws:.

value.documentation:
The value of the tag.

Constraints: Tag values are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 256 Unicode characters. Valid characters are Unicode letters, digits, white space, and any of the following symbols: _ . : / = + - @
